content: निस्तारः {@--1@} Crossing or passing over; संसार तव निस्तारपदवी न दवीयसी <ls>Bh. 1. 69.</ls> {@--2@} Getting rid of, release, escape, rescue. {@--3@} Final emancipation. {@--4@} Discharge or payment of a debt, acquittance, requital; वेतनस्य निस्तारः कृतः <ls>H. 3.</ls> {@--5@} A means, expedient.
